title: Razer’s new Blade 15 is the world’s first laptop with a 240Hz OLED display
content:
Razer has just announced a new version of its 2022 Blade 15 gaming laptop, which is the world’s first laptop to feature an OLED panel with a 240Hz refresh rate. Yes, you read that right, there’s now an OLED display with a 240Hz refresh rate on a laptop. Laptops with OLED displays have always been

The post Razer’s new Blade 15 is the world’s first laptop with a 240Hz OLED display appeared first on XDA.
description: Razer has announced a new model of the Blade 15 featuring an OLED panel with a 240Hz refresh rate. It will be available soon.
